original_text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things, by whom also he made the worlds;
korean_text: 이 모든 날 마지막에는 아들을 통하여 우리에게 말씀하셨으니 이 아들을 만유의 상속자로 세우시고 또 그로 말미암아 모든 세계를 지으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us
whom he hath appointed heir of all things
by whom also he made the worlds
